oai_dc:dc.dc:description: ||kabbo's maternal grandfather Ttono wo was killed by an adult rhinoceros. The names of some of Ttono wo's children are listed, with details of their personal history. 1) p.476v: ||kabbo's uncle (and father-in-law) =khuagen's name means 'little thorn bush', 2) This is found in Book III-1.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Genealogies: Ttono wo (who was killed by a rhinoceros)
